body: I usually like Oyster's work, but this one is a bit too much. It started out fine, but then chapter 8-9 came along and it surprisingly disgusts me. Fortunately, chapter 10 is great --so much gangrape and i ove it. Overall 8.5/10 --i can do without chapter 8-9, even though it added more depth to the story.

Wow. didn't know there was a part 10. I thought it was done after the last chapter. And I'm guessing by now most translators who still have their souls intact are not in a hurry to translate the finally chapter. So lets hope after this we get a different story for oyster. As for this story all together I give it a 8.9 out of 10.
